title: Would giving Katarina mana be a bad thing or a good thing?
body:
I've been pondering this for a while now. Would this be a bad/good idea? It seems like she can't be balanced with her numbers, the only thing that is really OP about her kit is her passive, and not having mana allows her to abuse the hell out of it.

GUISE I meant mana. ;-; I was doing two things at once. My apologies.
